title: Login issue
body:
I get the "unexpected error occurring while logging in"
I configured my DNS,Restarted my PC,Sync-ed my time,
I tryed to delete the RADS folder and run Client as an Admin,but if i delete it my Client process just dissapear .

replies.body: This error can happen if your connection to the patching server is being blocked or degrading.  Configuring your dns is an okay start but I wouldn't recommend modifying game files for a network issue.  You'll want to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to auto-configure firewall settings, which could be contributing to that block.  Let me know if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3AnJAar2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-23T18:43:39.691+0000)
>
> This error can happen if your connection to the patching server is being blocked or degrading.  Configuring your dns is an okay start but I wouldn't recommend modifying game files for a network issue.  You'll want to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to auto-configure firewall settings, which could be contributing to that block.  Let me know if that helps.

My firewall is off and already used Hextech repairing Tool
Thanks for the update!  Make sure to go over the steps in the connection guide to resolve this.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3AnJAar2,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-23T20:31:23.188+0000)
>
> Thanks for the update!  Make sure to go over the steps in the connection guide to resolve this.

I tryed most of the things found there on boards,using all Riot advices lice Conncetion issues page

If those steps didn't work, don't worry we can still help!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech guys will work with you towards a resolution, and reply back asap.  See you there!

Our tech guys will work with you towards a resolution, and reply back asap.  See you there!

Did it already before i posted this on board ;Hopefully they will find a solution.Thanks for help :)
And i need to say that 2 days ago,it worked perfectly,then,when i woke up and tryed to login i got this,and it seems that nothing can solve it...
